trans-unit.source: Compiles <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> and XML-format grammar files into binary grammar files with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.
trans-unit.target: 编译<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>和 XML 格式语法文件读入.cfg 扩展名的二进制语法文件并将输出发送到流。

trans-unit.source: You compile <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> objects and XML-format grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 编译<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>对象和到由语音识别引擎针对加载和使用进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: Compiling a speech recognition grammar using one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> methods can reduce the amount of time required to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> or an XML-format grammar.
trans-unit.target: 编译使用之一语音识别语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>方法可能会降低构造所需的时间量<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>或 XML 格式语法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a)。

trans-unit.source: Compiles an <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>object into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.
trans-unit.target: 编译<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>对象插入.cfg 扩展名的二进制语法文件并将输出发送到流。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a)。

trans-unit.source: The grammar to compile.
The stream that receives the results of compilation.
srgsGrammar is .
outputStream is .
Compiles an XML-format grammar file into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.
trans-unit.target: 将 XML 格式语法文件编译成.cfg 扩展名的二进制语法文件并将输出发送到流。

trans-unit.source: The XML-format grammar file must conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: XML 格式语法文件必须符合[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。

trans-unit.source: When accessing files, a security check is performed when the file is created or opened.
trans-unit.target: 当访问文件，创建或打开文件时执行安全检查。

trans-unit.source: The security check is typically not done again unless the file is closed and reopened.
trans-unit.target: 安全检查是通常不会再次执行除非关闭并重新打开该文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a)。

trans-unit.source: The path of the file to compile.
The stream that receives the results of compilation.
inputPath is .
outputStream is .
inputPath is an empty string.
Compiles data for an XML-format grammar file referenced by an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> into a binary grammar file with the .cfg extension and sends the output to a stream.
trans-unit.target: 编译引用的 XML 格式语法文件数据<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>到.cfg 扩展名的二进制语法文件并将输出发送到流。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The XML-format grammar file referenced by the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> must conform to the [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/).
trans-unit.target: 引用的 XML 格式语法文件<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>必须符合[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://www.w3.org/TR/speech-grammar/)。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Compile SRGS Grammars](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[编译 SRGS 语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/dbdd9e2b-62c7-4938-be84-3dcc77ad454a)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> that reads the grammar.
The grammar can reside in a physical file or in memory.
trans-unit.target: 语法可以驻留在的物理文件或在内存中。

trans-unit.source: The stream that will receive the results of compilation.
reader is .
outputStream is .
Compiles an SRGS document into a DLL.
trans-unit.target: 编译为 DLL SRGS 文档。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> that contains the grammar to compile.
The path of the output DLL.
A list of the assemblies referenced from the input grammars.
trans-unit.target: 从输入语法引用的程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that contains a pair of keys, thereby enabling the output DLL to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 包含一对密钥，从而启用 DLL 要签名的输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: srgsGrammar is .
outputPath is .
outputPath is an empty string.
Compiles multiple SRGS grammars into a DLL.
trans-unit.target: 将多个 SRGS 语法编译为 DLL。

trans-unit.source: A list of the grammars to compile.
trans-unit.target: 若要编译的语法的列表。

A list of the assemblies referenced from the input grammars.
trans-unit.target: 从输入语法引用的程序集的列表。

trans-unit.source: The name of the file that contains a pair of keys, thereby enabling the output DLL to be signed.
trans-unit.target: 包含一对密钥，从而启用 DLL 要签名的输出文件的名称。

trans-unit.source: inputPaths is .
outputPath is .
outputPath is an empty string.
Any element of the inputPaths array is .
trans-unit.target: 任何元素inputPaths数组是 。

trans-unit.source: Compiles an SRGS grammar into a DLL.
trans-unit.target: 编译为 DLL SRGS 语法。

The path of the output DLL.
